meanings.definition: Unkindliest: superlative form of unkind, lacking in kindness or compassion
meanings.sent1: The unkindliest person in the class never shared their toys.
meanings.sent2: She showed her unkindliest behavior when she ignored her friend's feelings.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpy cat seemed unkindliest when it refused to play.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered in an unkindliest manner, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The unkindliest words can leave the deepest wounds.

meanings.definition: Unkindliest: in an unkind manner, lacking in kindness or compassion
meanings.sent1: He spoke unkindliest when he criticized her artwork.
meanings.sent2: The teacher looked at him unkindliest after he disrupted the class.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail unkindliest as it chewed on the slipper.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled unkindliest through the night, making sleep impossible.
meanings.sent5: The unkindliest actions speak louder than words.
